properties.areaDesc: St Ignace to False Detour Channel; Straits of Mackinac within 5 nm of Mackinac Bridge including Mackinac Island
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 2 at 4:47AM EST until January 3 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Gaylord MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Highest gusts up to 25 kt and highest waves around 3
feet.

* WHERE...Straits of Mackinac within 5 nm of Mackinac Bridge
including Mackinac Island and St Ignace to False Detour
Channel.

* WHEN...Until 6 AM EST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM EST FRIDAY
